reviewtext: Needed a good carry bag for my Nikon D40 that i purchased recently.I use it mostly with the kit lens 18-55 mm which fits snugly into this lowerpro bag.Strap & the carry case is made of durable material, and i am satisfied with the purchase.Just be sure that your DSLR is not too big for this, this case should fit most medium sized dsl'rs with kit lenses;Also has front zip pouch to keep battery/sd card etc.
